0.1.name: wordpress/yet-another-twitter-plugin
0.1.description: This is a simple plugin for displaying an easily customisable twitter feed on your Wordpress installation. Adapted from the excellent Twitter for Wordpress plugin (http://rick.jinlabs.com/code/twitter) the main feature addition at the moment is support for a twitter lists to display feeds containing multiple users.
